name: Pixel Cup Soccer 17
description: Pixel Cup Soccer 17 is an arcade retro style soccer game. A dynamic arcade game with fast paced gameplay and engaging mechanics. Just the fun part of soccer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
